attributes.action: Free train fee for anyone with a young Scot card or senior card.
attributes.additional_details: It's absolutely outrageous having to pay £5 for a child ticket to get to glasgow from a few stops away. It should be free if it's not a train going to the other side of the country or out of it.
attributes.background: I want the government to make travel by train free in Scotland for people under 21 with a young Scot card and people over the age of 60 with a senior card just like it works with buses.

rejection.details:
Concessionary travel schemes in Scotland are a matter for the Scottish Government and Scottish Parliament, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to submit a petition to the Scottish Parliament's petitions system: https://petitions.parliament.scot/help
